en: Later that year when he came back to Manipur he found that his mother had died

en: He stayed with a friend in Wangkhei Ningthem Pukhri Mapal called Maibam Iboton Singh a renowned Polo player whose father Maibam Samden Singh  worked in the Manipur State Durbar of Meidingngu Churachand as Additional Darbar Member.It was then that he came in good relations with the royal family

en: He married the kings elder brothers daughter Khomdonsana
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯀꯤꯡꯁ ꯑꯍꯜ ꯑꯣꯏꯔꯕꯥ ꯃꯔꯨꯄꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯆꯥꯅꯨꯄꯤ ꯈꯣꯃꯗꯣꯟꯁꯥꯅꯥꯒꯥ ꯂꯨꯍꯣꯡꯈꯤ

en: He was then appointed a member of the Sadar panchayat

mni-Mtei: ꯑꯍꯥꯅꯕꯗꯥ ꯅꯤꯈꯤꯜ ꯃꯅꯤꯄꯨꯔꯤ ꯍꯤꯟꯗꯨ ꯃꯍꯥꯁꯥꯚꯥ ꯍꯥꯌꯅꯥ ꯈꯉꯅꯔꯝꯕꯥ ꯅꯤꯈꯤꯜ ꯃꯅꯤꯄꯨꯔꯤ ꯃꯍꯥꯁꯥꯚꯥ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯑꯣꯔꯒꯅꯥꯏꯖꯦꯁꯟ ꯑꯁꯤꯒꯤ ꯄ꯭ꯔꯁꯤꯗꯦꯟꯇ ꯑꯣꯏꯔꯤꯕꯥ ꯃꯍꯥꯔꯥꯖꯥ ꯆꯨꯟꯆꯟ ꯁꯤꯡꯍꯒꯤ ꯄꯦꯠꯔꯣꯅꯦꯖꯒꯤ ꯃꯈꯥꯗꯥ ꯂꯤꯡꯈꯠꯈꯤꯕꯅꯤ

en: All works were carried out by Hijam Irabot who was the vicepresident

en: Under Irabots guidance four sessions were held

mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯔꯥꯖꯥ ꯆꯨꯔꯥꯆꯟꯁꯀꯤ ꯃꯇꯃꯗꯥ ꯆꯤꯡꯒꯥꯗꯥ ꯑꯔꯣꯏꯕꯥ ꯑꯃꯗꯥ ꯏꯔꯥꯕꯣꯠꯅꯥ ꯑꯔꯤꯕꯥ ꯃꯤꯡꯗꯒꯤ ꯍꯤꯟꯗꯨ ꯊꯥꯗꯨꯅꯥ ꯁꯚꯥꯒꯤ ꯃꯃꯤꯡ ꯍꯣꯡꯗꯣꯀꯈꯤ

en: He transformed it into a political party
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯃꯁꯤꯕꯨ ꯔꯥꯖꯅꯤꯇꯤꯒꯤ ꯄꯥꯔꯇꯤ ꯑꯃꯗꯥ ꯑꯣꯟꯊꯣꯀꯈꯤ ꯫

en: Maharaja Churachand sent a warning to Irabot on the events taking place in his absence
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯔꯥꯖꯥ ꯆꯨꯔꯥꯆꯟꯗꯅꯥ ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯀꯤ ꯂꯩꯇꯕꯗꯥ ꯊꯣꯛꯂꯤꯕꯥ ꯊꯧꯗꯣꯀꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯇꯥꯡꯗꯥ ꯏꯔꯥꯕꯣꯠꯇꯥ ꯆꯦꯀꯁꯤꯅꯋꯥ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯊꯥꯔꯀꯈꯤ

en: Irabot and Elangbam Tompok a clerk at the revenue department resigned from the Sadar Panchayat
mni-Mtei: ꯏꯔꯥꯕꯣꯠ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯏꯂꯥꯡꯕꯝ ꯇꯣꯝꯄꯣꯛ ꯔꯦꯚꯤꯟꯌꯨ ꯕꯤꯚꯥꯒꯀꯤ ꯀ꯭ꯂꯥꯔꯛ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯁꯥꯗꯥꯔ ꯄꯟꯆꯥꯌꯠꯇꯒꯤ ꯔꯤꯖꯥꯏꯟ ꯇꯧꯈꯤ

mni-Mtei: ꯃꯈꯣꯌꯅꯥ ꯂꯦꯖꯤꯁ꯭ꯂꯦꯆꯔ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯐꯣꯡꯗꯣꯀꯈꯤ ꯃꯗꯨ ꯅꯤꯡꯊꯧ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯅꯤꯄꯨꯔ ꯔꯥꯖ꯭ꯌ ꯗꯔꯕꯥꯔꯗꯥ ꯄꯤꯁꯤꯅꯈꯤ꯫

en: It was rejected
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯁꯤ ꯔꯤꯖꯦꯛꯇ ꯇꯧꯈꯤ .

en: This phase could be termed as the socioreformer phase

en: Irabot headed this party and gave a speech at the Police lane in 1940

en: He was arrested and deported to the Silhet Jail Sylhet in Bangladesh present days

en: At the jail he met Indian communist leaders like Hemanga Biswas and Jyotirmoy Nandi

en: He was greatly influenced by them
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛ ꯃꯈꯣꯌꯒꯤ ꯃꯐꯃꯗꯥ ꯌꯥꯝꯅꯥ ꯏꯊꯤꯜ ꯄꯤꯈꯤ ꯫

en: But he was not permitted to enter Manipur

en: He stayed in Cachar district to work among the Manipuri peasants and also among the nonManipuri ex tea garden workers
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛ ꯃꯅꯤꯄꯨꯔꯤ ꯂꯧꯃꯤꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯔꯛꯇꯥ ꯊꯕꯛ ꯇꯧꯅꯕꯥ ꯀꯥꯆꯔ ꯖꯤꯂꯥꯗꯥ ꯂꯩꯈꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯅꯟ-ꯃꯅꯤꯄꯨꯔꯤ ꯑꯦꯛꯁ ꯇꯤ ꯒꯥꯔꯗꯦꯟ ꯋꯥꯔꯀꯔꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯔꯛꯇꯥꯁꯨ ꯂꯩꯈꯤ

en: There he joined the Kisan movements

en: He kept in touch with the communist leaders and attended the first Party congress of the Communist party of India that was held at Bombay from 23 May to 1 June 1943 as a special invitee from Cachar
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯀꯝꯝꯌꯨꯅꯤꯁ꯭ꯠ ꯂꯨꯆꯤꯡꯕꯁꯤꯡꯒꯥ ꯄꯥꯎ ꯐꯥꯑꯣꯅꯈꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯱꯹꯴꯳ꯒꯤ ꯃꯦ ꯲꯳ꯗꯒꯤ ꯖꯨꯟ ꯱ ꯐꯥꯑꯣꯕꯥ ꯕꯣꯝꯕꯦꯗꯥ ꯄꯥꯡꯊꯣꯀꯈꯤꯕꯥ ꯀꯝꯝꯌꯨꯅꯤꯁ꯭ꯠ ꯄꯥꯔꯇꯤ ꯑꯣꯐ ꯏꯟꯗꯤꯌꯥꯒꯤ ꯐꯥꯔꯁ꯭ꯠ ꯄꯥꯔꯇꯤ ꯀꯪꯒ꯭ꯔꯦꯁꯇꯥ ꯁꯔꯨꯛ ꯌꯥꯈꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯀꯥꯆꯔ

mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯕꯉ꯭ꯒꯥꯂꯒꯤ ꯃꯥꯏꯃꯦꯟꯁꯤꯡ ꯖꯤꯂꯥꯒꯤ ꯅꯦꯠꯔ ꯀꯣꯅꯥꯗꯥ ꯄꯥꯡꯊꯣꯀꯈꯤꯕꯥ ꯑꯣꯜ ꯏꯟꯗꯤꯌꯥ ꯀꯤꯁꯥꯟ ꯁꯚꯥ ꯁꯦꯁꯟꯗꯥ ꯀꯥꯆꯔꯗꯒꯤ ꯃꯤꯍꯨꯠ ꯀꯥꯡꯕꯨ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯂꯨꯆꯤꯡꯈꯤ꯫

en: In March 1944 he went to Bejwada Katakual Village to join the Kisan Conference and stayed for sometime at the Bengal Communist Party office
mni-Mtei: ꯱꯹꯴꯴ꯒꯤ ꯃꯥꯔꯆꯇꯥ ꯃꯍꯥꯛ ꯕꯦꯖꯋꯥꯗꯥ ꯀꯇꯀꯨꯜ ꯈꯨꯉ꯭ꯒꯪꯗꯥ ꯆꯠꯇꯨꯅꯥ ꯀꯤꯁꯥꯟ ꯀꯅꯐꯔꯦꯟꯁꯇꯥ ꯌꯥꯑꯣꯈꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯇꯝ ꯈꯔꯒꯤ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯥ ꯕꯦꯉ꯭ꯒꯜ ꯀꯝꯝꯌꯨꯅꯤꯁ꯭ꯠ ꯄꯥꯔꯇꯤꯒꯤ ꯑꯣꯐꯤꯁꯇꯥ ꯂꯩꯈꯤ

en: The same year he went to Sylhet to join the annual session of the Surma valley provisional Kisan Sabha
mni-Mtei: ꯆꯍꯤ ꯑꯗꯨꯃꯛꯇꯗꯥ ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯁꯤꯂꯍꯦꯠꯇꯥ ꯆꯠꯈꯤ ꯃꯗꯨꯗꯤ ꯁꯨꯔꯃꯥ ꯚꯦꯂꯤꯒꯤ ꯄ꯭ꯔꯣꯕꯤꯖꯅꯦꯜ ꯀꯤꯁꯥꯟ ꯁꯚꯥꯒꯤ ꯆꯍꯤꯒꯤ ꯁꯦꯁꯟꯗꯥ ꯁꯔꯨꯛ ꯌꯥꯅꯕꯥ

en: Irabot was detained as a security prisoner in the Silchar District jail with effect from 15 September 1944 on the charge that he was a communist
mni-Mtei: ꯏꯔꯥꯕꯣꯠ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯁꯤꯂꯆꯥꯔ ꯖꯤꯂꯥꯒꯤ ꯖꯦꯂꯗꯥ ꯁꯦꯛꯌꯨꯔꯤꯇꯤ ꯄ꯭ꯔꯤꯖꯅꯔ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯥ ꯊꯃꯈꯤꯕꯒꯥ ꯂꯣꯌꯅꯅꯥ ꯱꯹꯴꯴ꯒꯤ ꯁꯦꯞꯇꯦꯝꯕꯔ ꯱꯵ꯗꯒꯤ ꯃꯍꯥꯛ ꯀꯝꯝꯌꯨꯅꯤꯁ꯭ꯠ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯥ ꯂꯧꯈꯤꯕꯥ ꯊꯧꯗꯣꯛ ꯑꯗꯨꯗꯥ ꯆꯠꯅꯕꯥ ꯍꯧꯈꯤꯕꯅꯤ

en: He was released on 10 January 1945

en: After more than 5 years of political exile Irabot was given permission to stay in Manipur for a week from 2 to 10 September 1945

en: His request for an extension of his stay in Manipur was denied

en: He attended two sessions of the Nikhil Manipuri Mahasabha before he was expelled from the membership of the Working Committee of the Mahasabha on the charge of being a member of the Communist Party of India

en: A scuffle took place at Pungdongbam when the Manipur State Police prevented a group of citizens who came to attend the meeting in which a police officer was killed on the spot

en: He died on 26 September 1951 at the foothills of the Anggo Hills

en: He was born in 1895 in Uripok Sorbon Thingen leikai Imphal.He was influenced by Sanskrit tradition and is regarded as one of the bestknown writers of modern Meitei literature

en: He presented the first historical novel in Meitei  Lavangalata which is considered to be an outstanding work

en: His other prose works are Wakhalgi Ichen Thought Current Wakhal Thought Phidam Ideal Kannaba Wa Useful Words and Chhatra Macha Student

en: Indira Gandhi National Tribal University IGNTU is a Central University located in Madhya Pradesh India established in 2007 and named after former Indian prime minister Indira Gandhi.The university started its operations in 2008 from a temporary campus in Amarkantak and later shifted to its own campus in Lalpur 23 kilometers away

en: The Pena one of the oldest traditional Meitei musical instruments was once a part of luxurious living and was played at the royal gatherings in Kangleipak
mni-Mtei: ꯄꯦꯅꯥ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯃꯇꯝ ꯑꯃꯗꯥ ꯈ꯭ꯕꯥꯏꯗꯒꯤ ꯑꯔꯤꯕꯥ ꯇ꯭ꯔꯦꯗꯤꯁꯅꯦꯜ ꯃꯦꯏꯇꯦ ꯃ꯭ꯌꯨꯖꯤꯀꯦꯜ ꯏꯅꯁ꯭ꯠꯔꯨꯃꯦꯟꯇꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯅꯨꯡꯗꯥ ꯑꯃꯅꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯁꯤ ꯂꯛꯀꯔ ꯂꯤꯚꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯁꯔꯨꯛ ꯑꯃꯥ ꯑꯣꯏꯔꯝꯃꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯁꯤ ꯀꯥꯡꯂꯦꯏꯄꯥꯛꯇꯥ ꯂꯩꯕꯥ ꯔꯥꯖ꯭ꯌꯒꯤ ꯃꯤꯐꯃꯁꯤꯡꯗꯥ ꯁꯥꯟꯅꯈꯤꯕꯅꯤ

en: The instrument consist of two parts the main body penamasa or dhorr which is similar to that of a violin and the bow pena cheijing or chorr which is more resembling an archery bow than a violin bow
mni-Mtei: ꯏꯅꯁ꯭ꯠꯔꯨꯃꯦꯟꯇ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯚꯤꯌꯣꯂꯤꯟ ꯑꯃꯒꯥ ꯃꯥꯟꯅꯕꯥ ꯃꯔꯨ ꯑꯣꯏꯕꯥ ꯍꯀꯆꯥꯡꯒꯤ ꯄꯦꯅꯥꯃꯥꯁꯥ ꯅꯠꯠꯔꯒꯥ ꯙꯨꯔ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯋꯥꯏꯂꯤꯟ ꯕꯎꯗꯒꯤ ꯍꯦꯟꯅꯥ ꯑꯥꯔꯆꯔꯤ ꯕꯎ ꯑꯃꯒꯥ ꯃꯥꯟꯅꯕꯥ ꯕꯣ ꯄꯦꯅꯥ ꯆꯦꯏꯖꯤꯡ ꯅꯠꯠꯔꯒꯥ ꯆꯣꯔꯒꯤ ꯁꯔꯨꯛ ꯑꯅꯤ ꯌꯥꯑꯣꯏ꯫

en: The main body is made out of bamboo 10 to 11 inches long and 1 to 1.25 inches girth which is fixed to a coconut shell cut in half through two holes bore through the shell
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯔꯨꯑꯣꯏꯕꯥ ꯍꯀꯆꯥꯡ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯏꯟꯆꯤ ꯱꯰ꯗꯒꯤ ꯱꯱ ꯐꯥꯑꯣꯕꯥ ꯁꯥꯡꯕꯥ ꯕꯦꯝꯕꯣꯛ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯏꯟꯆꯤ ꯱ꯗꯒꯤ ꯱.꯲꯵ ꯐꯥꯑꯣꯕꯥ ꯒꯤꯔꯠ ꯇꯧꯗꯨꯅꯥ ꯁꯦꯝꯕꯅꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯁꯤ ꯁꯦꯜ ꯑꯗꯨꯒꯤ ꯃꯅꯨꯡꯗꯥ ꯍꯨꯔꯥꯅꯕꯥ ꯍꯨꯏ ꯑꯅꯤꯅꯥ ꯊꯥꯎꯃꯩ ꯑꯃꯗꯥ ꯊꯥꯎꯃꯩ ꯑꯃꯗꯥ ꯊꯥꯗꯨꯅꯥ ꯁꯦꯃꯒꯅꯤ꯫

en: Two additional holes are also drilled on the coconut shell for acoustic purposes one of which is covered by dried animal skin such as iguana skin and the other left open
